segments.text: I had a great time on the last date .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What will you up to this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: would you like to go to skating ? I was thinking of going out to the - - Saturday . It's great up there . Would you like to go with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to , but I don't care for skating very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , there is a bunch of going bowling on Sunday . Would you like to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like bowling , but I prefer to be along with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to dancing tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't feel like going out tonight , I am way too tired . I miss you , sweetheart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I miss you too . Tell me where you like to do the next day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 24th ? I have time . But I can't wait that long , I'm dying to see you . Let's make another time .
segments.speaker: S1
